name: My Bearer and I
description:
My Bearer isn't well. It got pretty badly injured in our last battle. I've been saved by my Bearer countless times, so it's only fair I do the saving for once.

 

This is a short game for Windows and OSX.  Move left with A, right with D. Approach an Energy Cube to pick it up. Watch out for your Bearer's health! A green aura is good, red is bad! 

   

made for #sadmechjam

by David Su and Colorfiction
